description: The vertical alignment point of an anchored object.

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the edge of the text or table column.
properties.name: COLUMN_EDGE

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the edge of the text frame.
properties.name: TEXT_FRAME

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the page margin.
properties.name: PAGE_MARGINS

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the edge of the page.
properties.name: PAGE_EDGE

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the baseline of the line of text.
properties.name: LINE_BASELINE

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the top of lower case letters with no ascent, such as x.
properties.name: LINE_XHEIGHT

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the top of the tallest letters in the text.
properties.name: LINE_ASCENT

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the top of capital letters.
properties.name: CAPHEIGHT

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the top of the text leading.
properties.name: TOP_OF_LEADING

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the top of the embox.
properties.name: EMBOX_TOP

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the middle of the embox.
properties.name: EMBOX_MIDDLE

properties.description: Align the anchored object to the bottom of the embox.
properties.name: EMBOX_BOTTOM

name: VerticallyRelativeTo
